record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 29, 2007)

[Page: H12134]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, due to official business in the 13th Congressional District of Michigan, I was unable to make several votes today. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on final passage of H.R. 3224, the Dam Rehabilitation and Repair Act of 2007; "yea" on final passage of H. Res. 573--Recognizing and commending the efforts of the United States public and advocacy groups to raise awareness about and help end the worsening humanitarian crisis and genocide in Darfur, Sudan, and for other purposes; and "yea" on final passage of H. Res. 747--Recognizing the religious and historical significance of the festival of Diwali.
